verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> [Tle-da-Vidof David מִזְמ֑וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor; A Psalm יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD חֲ֝קַרְתַּ֗נִי <S%H2713><s%> cha-kar-Ta-ni, thou hast searched וַתֵּדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> vat-te-Da'. me and known

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יָ֭דַעְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Ya-da'-ta Thou knowest שִׁבְתִּ֣י <S%H3427><s%> shiv-Ti my downsitting וְקוּמִ֑י <S%H6965><s%> ve-ku-Mi; and mine uprising בַּ֥נְתָּה <S%H995><s%> Ban-tah thou understandest לְ֝רֵעִ֗י <S%H7454><s%> le-re-'I, my thought מֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok. afar off

אָרְחִ֣י <S%H734><s%> 'a-re-Chi my path וְרִבְעִ֣י <S%H7252><s%> ve-riv-'I and my lying down זֵרִ֑יתָ <S%H2219><s%> ze-Ri-ta; Thou compassest וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all דְּרָכַ֥י <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chai [with] all my ways הִסְכַּֽנְתָּה׃ <S%H5532><s%> his-Kan-tah. and art acquainted

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki before אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there מִ֭לָּה <S%H4405><s%> Mil-lah For [there is] not a word בִּלְשׁוֹנִ֑י <S%H3956><s%> bil-sho-Ni; in my tongue הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [but] lo O LORD יָדַ֥עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta thou knowest כֻלָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3605><s%> chul-Lah. all

אָח֣וֹר <S%H268><s%> a-Chor me behind וָקֶ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> va-Ke-dem and before צַרְתָּ֑נִי <S%H6696><s%> tzar-Ta-ni; Thou hast beset וַתָּ֖שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> vat-Ta-shet and laid עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai and כַּפֶּֽכָה׃ <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pe-chah. thine hand

פִּלְאִיָּה pil-'i-yah כפְּלִ֣יאָֽה <S%H6383><s%> pe-Li-'ah secret קדַ֣עַת <S%H1847><s%> Da-'at [Such] knowledge מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni; is too נִ֝שְׂגְּבָ֗ה <S%H7682><s%> nis-ge-Vah, for me it is high לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not א֥וּכַֽל <S%H3201><s%> 'U-chal I cannot לָֽהּ׃ Lah.

אָ֭נָ֥ה <S%H575><s%> 'a-Nah Where אֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech go מֵרוּחֶ֑ךָ <S%H7307><s%> me-ru-Che-cha; air וְ֝אָ֗נָה <S%H575><s%> ve-'A-nah, Where מִפָּנֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nei-cha accept אֶבְרָֽח׃ <S%H1272><s%> 'ev-Rach. flee

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If אֶסַּ֣ק <S%H5266><s%> 'es-Sak If I ascend up שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> ma-yim into heaven שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham are there אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; I וְאַצִּ֖יעָה <S%H3331><s%> ve-'atz-Tzi-'ah thou [art] there if I make my bed שְּׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol in hell הִנֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ne-ka. behold

אֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> 'es-Sa [If] I take כַנְפֵי־ <S%H3671><s%> chan-fei- the wings שָׁ֑חַר <S%H7837><s%> Sha-char; of the morning אֶ֝שְׁכְּנָ֗ה <S%H7931><s%> 'esh-ke-Nah, [and] dwell בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> be-'a-cha-Rit in the uttermost parts יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> Yam. of the sea

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> ga-mo-Sha- Even שָׁ֭ם <S%H8033><s%> m there יָדְךָ֣ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha Even there shall thy hand תַנְחֵ֑נִי <S%H5148><s%> tan-Che-ni; lead וְֽתֹאחֲזֵ֥נִי <S%H270><s%> ve-to-cha-Ze-ni shall hold יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-Ne-cha. me and thy right hand

וָ֭אֹמַר <S%H559><s%> Va-'o-mar If I say אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- Surely חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> Cho-shech Surely the darkness יְשׁוּפֵ֑נִי <S%H7779><s%> ye-shu-Fe-ni; shall cover וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> ve-Lay-lah, me even the night א֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> or shall be light בַּעֲדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H1157><s%> ba-'a-De-ni. about me

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Even חֹשֶׁךְ֮ <S%H2822><s%> cho-sheCh Yea the darkness לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not יַחְשִׁ֪יךְ <S%H2821><s%> yach-Shich hideth מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Me-cha to You וְ֭לַיְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Ve-lay-lah not from thee but the night כַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> kai-Yom as the day יָאִ֑יר <S%H215><s%> ya-'Ir; shineth כַּ֝חֲשֵׁיכָ֗ה <S%H2825><s%> ka-cha-shei-Chah, the darkness כָּאוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H219><s%> ka-'o-Rah. and the light

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah You קָנִ֣יתָ <S%H7069><s%> ka-Ni-ta For thou hast possessed כִלְיֹתָ֑י <S%H3629><s%> chil-yo-Tai; my reins תְּ֝סֻכֵּ֗נִי <S%H5526><s%> te-suk-Ke-ni, thou hast covered בְּבֶ֣טֶן <S%H990><s%> be-Ve-ten womb אִמִּֽי׃ <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mi. me in my mother's

אֽוֹדְךָ֗ <S%H3034><s%> 'od-Cha, I will praise עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נוֹרָא֗וֹת <S%H3372><s%> no-ra-'ot, thee for I am fearfully נִ֫פְלֵ֥יתִי <S%H6395><s%> nif-Lei-ti [and] wonderfully made נִפְלָאִ֥ים <S%H6381><s%> nif-la-'Im marvellous מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei-cha; [are] thy works וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> ve-naf-Shi, and [that] my soul יֹדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> yo-Da-'at knoweth מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. right well

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- was not נִכְחַ֥ד <S%H3582><s%> nich-Chad was not hid עָצְמִ֗י <S%H6108><s%> 'a-tze-Mi, My substance מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Me-ka at אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- When עֻשֵּׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'us-Sei-ti from thee when I was made בַסֵּ֑תֶר <S%H5643><s%> vas-Se-ter; in secret רֻ֝קַּ֗מְתִּי <S%H7551><s%> ruk-Kam-ti, [and] curiously wrought בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת <S%H8482><s%> be-tach-ti-Yot in the lowest parts אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth

גָּלְמִ֤י׀ <S%H1564><s%> gal-Mi my substance yet being unperfect רָ֘א֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U did see עֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha, Thine eyes וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and in סִפְרְךָ֮ <S%H5612><s%> sif-re-Cha and in thy book כֻּלָּ֪ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam were all יִכָּ֫תֵ֥בוּ <S%H3789><s%> yik-Ka-Te-vu all [my members] were written יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim [which] in continuance יֻצָּ֑רוּ <S%H3335><s%> yutz-Tza-ru; were fashioned; וְלֹא ve-lo כוְלֹ֖ו <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not קאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad when [as yet there was] none בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וְלִ֗י ve-Li, מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- How יָּקְר֣וּ <S%H3365><s%> ya-ke-Ru How precious רֵעֶ֣יךָ <S%H7454><s%> re-'Ei-cha also are thy thoughts אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> 'El; unto me O God מֶ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> meh How עָ֝צְמוּ <S%H6105><s%> 'A-tze-mu how great רָאשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Hem. is the sum

אֶ֭סְפְּרֵם <S%H5608><s%> 'Es-pe-rem [If] I should count מֵח֣וֹל <S%H2344><s%> me-Chol than the sand יִרְבּ֑וּן <S%H7235><s%> yir-Bun; them they are more in number הֱ֝קִיצֹ֗תִי <S%H6974><s%> he-ki-Tzo-ti, when I awake וְעוֹדִ֥י <S%H5750><s%> ve-'o-Di I am still עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach. with

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- O תִּקְטֹ֖ל <S%H6991><s%> tik-Tol Surely thou wilt slay אֱל֥וֹהַּ׀ <S%H433><s%> e-Lo-ah O God רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha'; the wicked וְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> ve-'an-Shei men דָ֝מִ֗ים <S%H1818><s%> da-Mim, from me therefore ye bloody ס֣וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> Su-ru depart מֶֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> Men-ni. at

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher they יֹ֭אמְרֻךָ <S%H559><s%> Yo-me-ru-cha For they speak לִמְזִמָּ֑ה <S%H4209><s%> lim-zim-Mah; against thee wickedly נָשֻׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> na-Su take לַשָּׁ֣וְא <S%H7723><s%> lash-Shav [thy name] in vain עָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6145><s%> 'a-Rei-cha. [and] thine enemies

הֲלֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- not מְשַׂנְאֶ֖יךָ <S%H8130><s%> me-san-'Ei-cha Do not I hate יְהוָ֥ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh them O LORD אֶשְׂנָ֑א <S%H8130><s%> 'es-Na; that hate וּ֝בִתְקוֹמְמֶ֗יךָ <S%H8618><s%> u-vit-kom-Mei-cha, with those that rise up אֶתְקוֹטָֽט׃ <S%H6962><s%> et-ko-Tat. thee;and am not I grieved

תַּכְלִ֣ית <S%H8503><s%> tach-Lit them with perfect שִׂנְאָ֣ה <S%H8135><s%> sin-'Ah hatred שְׂנֵאתִ֑ים <S%H8130><s%> se-ne-Tim; I hate לְ֝אוֹיְבִ֗ים <S%H341><s%> le-'oy-Vim, I count them mine enemies הָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yu have become לִֽי׃ Li.

חָקְרֵ֣נִי <S%H2713><s%> cha-ke-Re-ni Search אֵ֭ל <S%H410><s%> 'el me O God וְדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> ve-Da' and know לְבָבִ֑י <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vi; my heart בְּ֝חָנֵ֗נִי <S%H974><s%> be-cha-Ne-ni, try וְדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> ve-Da' me and know שַׂרְעַפָּֽי׃ <S%H8312><s%> sar-'ap-Pai. my thoughts

וּרְאֵ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh, And see אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech- way עֹ֥צֶב <S%H6090><s%> 'O-tzev if [there be any] wicked בִּ֑י Bi; וּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי <S%H5148><s%> u-ne-Che-ni, in me and lead בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech me in the way עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. everlasting
